title: Designing Online Bible College Courses: A Distance Collaborative Learning Model

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: A program aimed at strengthening online course development capabilities in Christian educational institutions, emphasizing an environment that integrates scientific methodologies with faith-based approaches.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the online Bible lecture design process with over 80% accuracy using remote collaboration tools.
Learners can collaborate with peers to develop three or more specific assessment rubrics.
Learners can validate the validity of Bible education materials at a 90% level by applying scientific research methodologies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
